p: Basil was grown in 500 mL plastic pots, at 20 plants per pot. The plants were cultured in medium Horticultural substrate B with active humus (Rašelina Soběslav Ltd., Soběslav, Czech Republic), irrigated as needed, protected from pests and diseases, and once fertilized (Kristalon Gold, Agro CS, Lučenec, Slovak Republic; dosage: 10 g of fertilizer per 10 L of water). The basil plants were harvested before their flowering. After drying (at room temperature) the plants were stored in paper bags in a dark place until the time of steam distillation.
